summary:
## FIFA World Cup

The FIFA World Cup is a global soccer tournament held every four years since 1930 (except during World War II). 32 teams compete for the title, qualifying through a three-year process. The current champions are Argentina.

The World Cup is the most popular sporting event globally, with billions watching. It has been hosted by 17 countries, and the 2026 tournament will be held in Canada, the United States, and Mexico. Brazil holds the record for most wins (5).
title: FIFA World Cup
